name: Dracula Series: Part 1 - The Strange Case of Martha
name_original: Dracula Series: Part 1 - The Strange Case of Martha
description:
Dracula Series: Part 1 - The Strange Case of Martha is an adventure game developed by Tetraedge. It came out on 06-10-2010. It was published by Anuman Interactive.
You can play Dracula Series: Part 1 - The Strange Case of Martha on PC.
